page.title: 03FARMS AND MACHINERY
page.content: { FARMS AND MACHINERY { ___________________ { }Because of the price of land there are not large numbers of small farms. It is possible in the future that the sizes of farms will increase as it is only the bigger companies that can afford the high prices of land. In the last 10 _ 20 years there has been a tendency for field sizes to be increased in line with machinery size so that farmers could farm their land more efficiently. This trend has now come to an end in this part of the country and we are unlikely to see any further increases in the field size.
